mapper.select: select * from lpt_post where match(post_title, post_content) against(#{words} in boolean mode ) limit 0, #{limit};
select category_id from lpt_category where match(category_name, category_intro) against(#{words} in boolean mode ) limit 0, #{limit};
select user_id, user_nickname, user_intro, user_raw_avatar, user_type, user_state from lpt_user where match(user_nickname, user_intro) against(#{words} in boolean mode ) limit 0, #{limit};
